title: The World parade: America's wonderlands
brief_description: An American travelogue showing many of America’s famous national parks including the Rocky Mountains National Park and Yellowstone. Also features other areas of interest such as the magnificent Niagara Falls and the Yosemite Falls and glimpses of Colorado, Oregon, Utah, Arizona, California and New York.
